item.title: Contact
item.description: Do you have any suggestion for this site? I would love to hear about it. send your message using below contact form and we will try to reach back to you as soon as possible. Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message

item.title: About
item.description: I am Rishav Bhardwaj and I am a Software Developer and a Hacker living in India. I started my journey with Android OS Modding Scene and then went on to Linux Kernel development, Reverse Engineering of device driver binaries, And now I do Web Dev for freelancing and to become a solopreneur.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello World to my blog site, Here I am going to write about the Topics which really interest me like Technology, Art and Philosophy and some other topics as well. I provide RSS feed for all of my topics so you can subscribe to any one which you like, so my posts on other topic will not bother you. There is a comment section on each page of the blog so you can comment your thoughts on that topic and if you need to contact me or have to send me some private message you can go to contact page.
